Name: fromRoleNames
Description: List of role names. Only users in these roles are loaded. Leave empty to load all users.

Name: componentId
Description: Unique identifier of this component instance.

Name: selectedUser
Description: Holds the selected user value.

Name: excludedUsernames
Description: List of usernames to exclude from selection. Only applies when using the default completeMethod.

Name: requiredMessage
Description: Validation message displayed when the required field is empty.

Name: forceSelection
Description: When enabled, only users from the suggestion list can be selected.

Name: minQueryLength
Description: Minimum number of characters required to start searching.

Name: completeMethod
Description: Custom method for loading users. Must accept a String query and return List<UserDTO>.

Name: isDisabled
Description: Disables the user selection input.

Name: isRequired
Description: Marks the user selection field as required.

Name: isReadOnly
Description: Prevents changing the selected user when enabled.

Name: isRenderedMessage
Description: Controls whether validation messages are rendered.

Name: hightlight
Description: Automatically highlights the first suggested user.

Name: floatingLabel
Description: Displays the label using floating style.

Name: autocompleteStyleClass
Description: CSS style class applied to the autocomplete component.

Name: autoCompletePanelStyleClass
Description: CSS style class applied to the autocomplete dropdown panel.

Name: inputStyleClass
Description: CSS style class applied to the autocomplete input field.

Name: labelStyleClass
Description: CSS style class applied to the label.

Name: label
Description: Label text for the user selection component.

Name: size
Description: Number of characters used to determine the width of the input element.

Name: messageStyleClass
Description: CSS style class applied to the validation message.

Name: itemLabel
Description: Displayed text of selected user item and users in dropdown list.

Name: cache
Description: If true, autocomplete caches search result list.

Name: moreText
Description: The text shown in panel when the suggested list is greater than maxResults.

Name: queryDelay
Description: Delay in milliseconds before sending a query to the server.

Name: maxResults
Description: Maximum number of results to be displayed.

Name: scrollHeight
Description: scrollHeight attribute of primefaces autocomplete.

Name: hasCustomizedSelectionList
Description: Displays a customized selection list when enabled.

Name: isShowAvatarInSelectionList
Description:
| Displays user avatars in the selection list when enabled. Set to true to show avatar.
| The setting will detect Portal setting Portal.ShowAvatar as its default value, refer to HowTo: Update :ref:`update-portal-settings` for more details.
| If the Portal setting is not available, defaults to true.

Name: displayNameRenderedInSelectionList
Description: Controls visibility of the user display name in the selection list.

Name: displayNameInSelectionListStyleClass
Description: CSS style class for the user display name in the selection list.

Name: selectionListContainerStyleClass
Description: CSS style class for the selection list item container.

Name: emptyMessage
Description: Message displayed when no results are available.
